ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime
More A Little to the Left!

editorialNotes.standard: Neatly arranging fountain pens and acrylic paints not only declutters drawers and cupboards but also soothes our minds.

ios.subtitle: Trickier A Little to the Left

editorialNotes.standard: Pencil in time for nostalgic cannon duels in this hand-drawn reimagining of an old-school classic, where cannonballs fly while scribbled tumbleweeds bounce across graphite landscapes.
Use curious elevators to cross beautiful buildings in a puzzler thats as stylish as it is confounding.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: A Dance of Fire and Ice

editorialNotes.standard: Tiny Wings has been a longtime favorite of ours, thanks to its gentle vibe, fantastic music, and surprisingly awesome one-touch gameplay. Outrunning the sun across procedurally generated islands is rewarding and relaxing, and we love the added challenge of the four-bird race mode. The games vivid, vibrant colors absolutely dazzle on Apple TVwe feel like were meeting our flightless friends for the first time again.

editorialNotes.tagline: Our favourite love guru is back!

editorialNotes.standard: Mash through waves of foes as a heavily armed potato in this spud-tacular arena survival game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: From the developer that brought the superb board game Carcassonne to iOS comes a fiendishly tricky puzzler thatll test your memory and your reflexes. To clear each set of colorful tiles, youll need to follow specific rules in orderlike removing odd-numbered tiles first, then ones with animalsbefore the clock runs out. Each super-short level is more tense and demanding than the last, making it that much more satisfying when you clean the board and progress to the next challenge.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Explore the nature of AIand learn a thing or two about yourselfin this snappy RPG that doubles as a personality test.

Terry Cavanaghs Super Hexagon is quite simply one of the most challenging games weve ever played. A pulsating chiptunes soundtrack underscores the danger as swirling walls close in around you and you race to escape the contracting maze. With the geometric action heaping on the punishment (the easiest difficulty is appropriately labeled Hard), every small achievement feels like a massive victory, whether youre topping your high score or overcoming a singularly tricky section.
editorialNotes.short: This is still one of our favorites. Few games are this satisfying to master.

editorialNotes.tagline: No! No! No! NO! No? No. No!

editorialNotes.standard: With surreal illustrations and fruit-headed characters, this point-and-click adventure is as strange as it is clever.

Railbounds tough puzzles are brilliantly focused. Youre given only a handful of rail tiles to guide train cars to the correct destinations in the correct order, and yet even with limited options the potential solutions feel limitless. Do you lay track so Car 4 goes through a tunnel and waits at a crossing gate for Cars 2 and 3 to pass? Do you create loops to delay Car 2? Do you ignore the crossing gate altogether? Few games make success feel like its always just within reach, even when it isnt. A helpful hint system keeps the difficulty from going completely off the rails.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Ski Safari returns with an all-new look and the same addicting gameplay. Now you can hit the slopes as Sven's sister, Evana, boot up with a snowboard, and unlock all sorts of new power-ups. To outrun an impending avalanche youll need to crash through cabins, team up with Yetis and eagles, and perform tons of tricks. The gameplay is as fast-paced as ever, and a fresh multiplayer mode and colorful new worlds to explore (like a prehistoric volcano) will keep you cruising down these mountains for a long time.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: If you took Super Hexagon, Impossible Road, andTempestand shoved them in a blender, the resulting smoothie would probably taste like Octagon. Its a psychedelic infinite runner backed by lean-mean electronic music and a difficulty thatll have you begging for mercy while you tap Retry.
A talking goat ate your grimoire! Relearn recipes by collecting reagents and tricking folks in this bewitchingly fun fairy tale.

The virtual Rube Goldberg machines that make up Perchangs gorgeous levels are so lovely to look at that you might forget what youre here to domove marbles into their proper pipes. With contraptions ranging from flippers to conveyer belts at your disposal, this inventive 3D puzzler requires an intoxicating mix of skill, smarts, and laser-sharp focus.
